sub_title: Certified LinkedIn expert & consultant- I can help you and your business to create a LinkedIn strategy that delivers high quality leads - Grow your business, book a FREE 20 min advice call
summary:
Hi there, welcome to my profile! I'm Wendy, a LinkedIn consultant and trainer with over 8 years of experience in helping businesses, entrepreneurs, and professionals to grow their businesses with LinkedIn. I'm also an ex-LinkedIn employee, so I know the ins and outs of the platform and how to leverage its full potential for your goals.

My passion is to share my knowledge and experience with my clients and empower them to become experts in their fields. Whether you need help with LinkedIn advertising, organic strategies, personal branding, or profile optimization, I have the solutions for you. I offer 1-1 coaching, masterclasses, and tailor-made packages to suit your needs and budget. Some of the clients I've worked with include Tribal Impact, Plinkr, NucleusBI, PAQT.com, and more. If you're curious to find out more or want to work with me, feel free to send me a message or visit my website. I'd love to hear from you and help you grow with LinkedIn!

projects.title: Social Media Masterclass for Irish Charities
projects.description:
As part of Oracle Direct's CSR strategy, the social team organised a one day social media marketing seminar for a group of Ireland's leading charitable organisations including Focus Ireland, Multiple Sclerosis Ireland, Age Action, Irish Wheelchair Association and Care After Prison.

Topics covered included:

- An Introduction to Social Media Marketing for Charities
- Content Marketing for Charities
- PPC Advertising (Facebook and Twitter)
- Measuring ROI - Social Media Analytics
- Creating an Integrated Social Campaign (with minimal budget)
- Breakout Sessions (with Q+A)

company.name: Wendy van Gilst - LinkedIn Strategy Consultant

profile_positions.company: LinkedIn For Business by Wendy van Gilst
profile_positions.description:
As a LinkedIn consultant, I help you to become the EXPERT and to get the most out of LinkedIn!

What parts of LinkedIn can I help you with?
- LinkedIn advertising
- LinkedIn pages and organic strategy
- Personal branding and LinkedIn profile

What do I offer?
- LinkedIn advertising the basics masterclass
- LinkedIn advertising advanced masterclass
- LinkedIn pages and organic strategies 
- LinkedIn profile masterclass
- LinkedIn personal branding masterclass
- 1-1 coaching 

What makes me unique? 
- Ex-LinkedIn (5.5 years at LinkedIn)
- 1-1 coaching to make you the expert (in combination with workshops possible)
- Long term relationships to really drive results
- Flexibility, I make a packages tailor made based on your LinkedIn needs
- Available when you need me, via email support or a quick call

Curious to find out more or do you want to work together? Schedule a free 30 min online introduction: https://calendly.com/wendyvangilst/online-introduction
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description: Weekly podcast episode about personal branding. I share my own experience and insights and speak with experts in the field about a variety of topics related to personal branding.
profile_positions.title: Owner LinkedIn for Business The Podcast

profile_positions.description:
After attending the LinkedIn Road Show 2016 in London I realized a lot of people and companies have similar challenges, questions and most important passion about Social Selling. I couldn't really find a place where those people meet and collaborate online so I decided to set up the Social Selling Experts LinkedIn Group. This LinkedIn Group is a very engaged group of people who are passioned about Social Selling and are open to share experience and learn from each other.

Are you a Social Seller, involved in Social Selling in your business or the owner of a Social Selling Strategy? Make sure you join our Social Selling Experts Group!
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
As a client solutions manager I'm a trusted digital marketing advisor for my clients. I'm a strategic solution driver who helps enterprise companies in the Benelux to achieve their marketing objectives using LinkedIn Marketing Solutions in the best way possible. My background as a marketer helps me to step into my client's shoes and to understand how digital marketing can be used best to drive success. Insights driven reporting, growth hacking, content and audience recommendations, are part of my core responsibilities. Together with an Account Director, I'm responsible for the Tech and Government industry. 

On a daily basis I tell stories with insights, create and present QBR reports for my clients, demo (new) products, educate my clients on their marketing strategies including how to measure ROI, deliver Content Marketing Workshops and create and maintain valuable client relationships.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Client Solutions Manager

profile_positions.description: I ensure the delivery of global scalable social strategies and best practices for Sage developed through education, enablement and close collaboration with stakeholders and colleagues. I'm focused on driving revenue, delivering KPIs and providing the best ROI for the business. The goal is to make social central to all media and communications we deliver to our audiences here at Sage that help our customers build a better business. To make sure we deliver the right message at the right time to the right audience on the right platform in right medium for them.
profile_positions.title: Head of social media

profile_positions.description: In this role I develop, plan, implement and measure social demand generation campaigns. I'm responsible for paid and organic social media for our global campaigns and local product campaigns. Our social media campaigns need to integrate with our other digital marketing channels to create a good customer experience. I work on a daily basis with Facebook Business Manager, LinkedIn Campaign Manager and Twitter Ads and work very closely with our paid media and creative agencies. I create and run social media activities around events and work together with partners, ISV's and sales teams. Next to this I onboard and enable sales teams on social selling.
profile_positions.title: Global Social Media and Content Manager

profile_positions.description: On a daily basis I work on the global social presence of Sage Live and the CBC team. This includes a social strategy for Sage Live, planning and executing of social media programs to generate leads and training and onboarding of social selling for the CBC team.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a social media business listener help sales reps getting a good understanding of the accounts, prospects and market that they are working on. I develop Social Listening reports, through an innovative combination of people and social media monitoring technology, including social listening, social auditing, analysis, interpretation and action.
I work together with the inside sales team’s for readiness to effectively leverage social media, through listening, analysis and identifying and sharing good practice, bringing ‘social’ to the core of the sales teams for customer engagement.
I collaborate with all Oracle LOB's to maintain a unified social media strategy, training and exploit new tools and processes to increase sales productivity and enhance customer's and prospects’ experience as they engage with Oracle.

As Social Selling lead I'm point for contact for both LinkedIn and internal stakeholders regarding all Sales Navigator licenses for Oracle direct. I train, onboard and support The Oracle Direct sales teams on social selling and Sales Navigator. 

I daily work with solutions and tools like Oracle Sales Cloud, Sysomos, Oracle Marketing Cloud, 360 Social, Oracle SRM, Followerwonk, Riffle, Hootsuite, Buffer, IKO, Wordpress LinkedIn post, and LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Business Listener and Social Selling lead

profile_positions.description:
In this sales position at Oracle I am responsible for our marketing, CRM and customer experience products in the Benelux market. I work with key stakeholders for marketing and sales to improve customer experience and customer engagement. Next to this I evangelize the principles and power of social selling to my customers, techniques that I daily use to get to my know my customers and create pipeline. 

Specialist: Eloqua, Right Now and Oracle Sales Cloud
profile_positions.title: Business Relationship Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Daily helping SMB entrepreneurs understand the value of social media for engaging and truly connecting with customers. I worked together with 50+ different entrepreneurs and improved there engagement with there customers. Therefore I advice these entrepreneurs on their social media strategy, this is accomplished by advising on:
- How to start with social media from a business perspective
- How to use social media as an organization
- How to create content that connects
- How to get more shares and likes
- How to create campaigns
- How to interact with customers
- How to engage with customers
- How to generate leads with social media

I believe that every entrepreneur should be a customer focused company and this can be achieved with a strong social media strategy. Main activities: consulting, customized workshops and presentations.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: Responsible for meeting and exceeding targets for 5 VERO MODA stores and 1 Chess store (total 40+ employees). I accomplish this by supporting and coaching the shop managers and by creating a team that performs well. Furthermore I am responsible for recruitment, HRM and day to day operational management.  Responsible for Social Media for all stores. I am driven professional with an entrepreneurial mindset.
profile_positions.title: Area Manager Vero Moda

profile_positions.description: Building a platform for talent. Responisble for the further development of this concept, the development of a sustainable business model and brandbuilding across all disciplines.
profile_positions.title: Marketing&Sales

profile_positions.description: Design and implement marketing and communication plans, including the development of written communication, marketing and promotional materials, mailings and social media strategy.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Marketing & communications consultant
